content.value:

content.html:
Although I didn’t retain my hairline, a recent glance at a photo of a younger me with receding hair was quite enlightening. Believe me when I tell you, I’m calling this a win.

content.html:
Thankfully my previous post didn’t downgrade my life, but it did mess up my Microblogvember streak due to using the wrong prompt word. The good news is I’m still used to laughing at my own foibles. Just thought I’d update you on this comical state of affairs.

content.html:
My core strength and centre of gravity have clearly aged along with the rest of me. When I played hockey I could traverse ice outside like a polar bear. Now I look like a drunken penguin.

#mbnov

content.html:
I’ll never tire of hearing and smelling my coffee beans grinding every single morning. It’s my daily moment of zen, and I wouldn’t have it any other way.

Should this ever change please send help, as this means I’ve likely been kidnapped and replaced.

#mbnov

content.html:
I lament humanity didn’t realize at least two decades ago there is no plan B for us, nor the climate. As a result we find ourselves staring down the barrel of a planetary apocalyptic flamethrower. Fearing the times ahead.

#mbnov
